New Records: Shaheen Shah Afridi returned career-best figures of 4-22.
Key Match Events: Shaheen Shah Afridi took 4 wickets for 22 runs.
Muhammad Rizwan top-scored for Pakistan with a run-a-ball 32.
Najmul Hossain Shanto top-scored for Bangladesh with 54.
Shadab Khan struck twice on successive balls.
Mohammad Haris made 31 and put on partnerships including a 29-run stand with Shan Masood.
Post-Match Reflections: Shaheen Shah Afridi expressed happiness about his performance and the team's effort.
Shakib Al Hasan was visibly stunned and unhappy with the umpire's decision.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match turned into a virtual quarter-final after the Netherlands stunned South Africa.
Pakistan recovered from losses in the opening two matches to reach the semi-finals.
